tools.name: React
tools.description: React makes it painless to create interactive UIs. Design simple views for each state in your application, and React will efficiently update and render just the right components when your data changes. Declarative views make your code more predictable and easier to debug.

tools.name: Godot
tools.description: Godot provides a huge set of common tools, so you can just focus on making your game without reinventing the wheel.

tools.name: Traefik
tools.description: An open-source reverse proxy and load balancer for HTTP and TCP-based applications that is easy, dynamic, automatic, fast, full-featured, production proven, provides metrics, and integrates with every major cluster technology.

tools.name: CodeSandbox
tools.description: CodeSandbox is an online editor that helps you create web applications, from prototype to deployment.

tools.name: Sapper
tools.description: Sapper is a framework for building web applications of all sizes, with a beautiful development experience and flexible filesystem-based routing. Unlike single-page apps, Sapper doesn't compromise on SEO, progressive enhancement or the initial load experience — but unlike traditional server-rendered apps, navigation is instantaneous for that app-like feel.

tools.name: Svelte
tools.description: Svelte is a radical new approach to building user interfaces. Whereas traditional frameworks like React and Vue do the bulk of their work in the browser, Svelte shifts that work into a compile step that happens when you build your app.Instead of using techniques like virtual DOM diffing, Svelte writes code that surgically updates the DOM when the state of your app changes.

tools.name: Go
tools.description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

tools.name: Vue.js
tools.description: Vue is a progressive framework for building user interfaces.

tools.name: API Platform
tools.description: API Platform is a set of tools to build and consume web APIs

tools.name: Gridsome
tools.description: Gridsome is a free and open source Vue.js-powered framework for building websites & apps that are fast by default.

tools.name: React Static
tools.description: A progressive static-site generator for React.

tools.name: Docker
tools.description: Securely build, share and run modern applications anywhere

tools.name: Symfony
tools.description: Symfony is a set of PHP Components, a Web Application framework, a Philosophy, and a Community — all working together in harmony.

tools.name: Laravel
tools.description: The PHP Framework for Web Artisans

tools.name: Caddy
tools.description: Caddy 2 is a powerful, enterprise-ready, open source web server with automatic HTTPS written in Go

tools.name: Visual Studio Code
tools.description: Visual Studio Code combines the simplicity of a code editor with what developers need for their core edit-build-debug cycle. It provides comprehensive code editing, navigation, and understanding support along with lightweight debugging, a rich extensibility model, and lightweight integration with existing tools.

tools.name: Prepack
tools.description: A tool for making JavaScript code run faster.

tools.name: ZEIT
tools.description: All-in-one solution for static & JAMStack deployment for performance-obsessed teams.

tools.name: Cloudflare
tools.description: Cloudflare speeds up and protects millions of websites, APIs, SaaS services, and other properties connected to the Internet.

tools.name: Rocket.Chat
tools.description: Rocket.Chat is free, unlimited and open source. Replace email, HipChat & Slack with the ultimate team chat software solution.
